data.eml:eml: A systematic appraisal of the types of ten species of Otostigmus (Parotostigmus) (Scolopendromorpha, Scolopendridae, Otostigminae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chagas-Jr, Amazonas (2016): A systematic appraisal of the types of ten species of Otostigmus (Parotostigmus) (Scolopendromorpha, Scolopendridae, Otostigminae). Zootaxa 4147 (1): 36-58, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4147.1.2
